sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { BarChart3, FileText, Image, Video, Mail, Palette, Clock, TrendingUp } from 'lucide-react'; import { useWebsiteBuilder } from '../context/WebsiteBuilderContext'; const WebsiteStats = () => { const { getWebsiteStats } = useWebsiteBuilder(); const stats = getWebsiteStats(); const getComponentTypeIcon = (type) => { const iconMap = { 'hero': 'ðŸŽ¯', 'text': 'ðŸ“', 'grid': 'âœ¨', 'gallery': 'ðŸ–¼ï¸', 'testimonials': 'ðŸ’¬', 'contact': 'ðŸ“§', 'newsletter': 'ðŸ“°', 'product-grid': 'ðŸ›ï¸', 'team': 'ðŸ‘¥', 'pricing': 'ðŸ’°', 'stats': 'ðŸ“Š', 'timeline': 'ðŸ“…', 'accordion': 'â“', 'tabs': 'ðŸ“‘', 'social-feed': 'ðŸ“±', 'video-section': 'ðŸŽ¥', 'image-text-overlay': 'ðŸ–¼ï¸', 'product-detail': 'ðŸ“¦', 'navbar': 'ðŸ§­', 'breadcrumbs': 'ðŸž', 'pagination': 'ðŸ“„', 'contact-advanced': 'ðŸ“ž', 'hero-video': 'ðŸŽ¬', 'hero-split': 'ðŸ“', 'text-two-column': 'ðŸ“„', 'text-with-image': 'ðŸ–¼ï¸', 'grid-4': 'ðŸŽ¯', 'gallery-masonry': 'ðŸ§±', 'gallery-carousel': 'ðŸŽ ', 'clients': 'ðŸ¢' }; return iconMap[type] || 'ðŸ“„'; }; const getReadabilityScore = () => { const avgWordsPerSentence = stats.estimatedWordCount / Math.max(stats.totalComponents, 1); if (avgWordsPerSentence < 10) return { score: 'Excellent', color: 'text-green-600', bg: 'bg-green-100' }; if (avgWordsPerSentence < 15) return { score: 'Good', color: 'text-blue-600', bg: 'bg-blue-100' }; if (avgWordsPerSentence < 20) return { score: 'Fair', color: 'text-yellow-600', bg: 'bg-yellow-100' }; return { score: 'Complex', color: 'text-red-600', bg: 'bg-red-100' }; }; const readability = getReadabilityScore(); return (

Website Analytics

{/* Key Metrics */}
Components
{stats.totalComponents}
Words
{stats.estimatedWordCount}
Types
{Object.keys(stats.componentTypes).length}
Readability
{readability.score}
{/* Media Analysis */}

Media Analysis

{stats.hasImages ? 'Has Images' : 'No Images'}
{stats.hasForms ? 'Has Forms' : 'No Forms'}
{/* Component Breakdown */}

Component Breakdown

{Object.entries(stats.componentTypes) .sort(([,a], [,b]) => b - a) .slice(0, 5) .map(([type, count]) => (
{getComponentTypeIcon(type)} {type.replace('-', ' ')}
{count}
))}
{/* Recommendations */}

ðŸ’¡ Recommendations

    {stats.totalComponents < 3 && (
  • â€¢ Add more content sections to make your website more engaging
    • )} {!stats.hasImages && (
  • â€¢ Consider adding images to make your website more visually appealing
    • )} {!stats.hasForms && (
  • â€¢ Add a contact form to capture leads and inquiries
    • )} {stats.estimatedWordCount < 50 && (
  • â€¢ Add more descriptive content to improve SEO and user engagement
    • )} {Object.keys(stats.componentTypes).length < 3 && (
  • â€¢ Try different component types to create variety in your layout
    • )}
); }; export default WebsiteStats;
